text:
Nishitokyo
Nishitokyo
( 西東京市
Nishitōkyō-shi
) is a city in
Tokyo prefecture
.
Understand
Nishitokyo is located in western Tokyo , about 30 minutes by train from Shinjuku .
Like much of western Tokyo , it 's largely residential , with businesses concentrated around the train stations .
The area has a lot of small parks and trees , in contrast with central Tokyo , which has skyscrapers and a lot more concrete .
Get in
The only train line running through the city is the Seibu Shinjuku Line ( 西武新宿線 ) , which ends in Shinjuku to the east and Hon-Kawagoe to the west .
See
Skytower West Tokyo
( スカイタワー西東京 ) ( 20 minutes ' walk WNW from Tanashi Station . ) .
This tall tower is perhaps the only iconic landmark in Nishitokyo .
At night , it lights in varying colors .
Do
DyDo Drinco Ice Arena
( ダイドードリンコアイスアリーナ ) , Higashi Fushimi
3-1-25
( Just SE of Higashi Fushimi Station . ) , ☏ +81 42-467-7171 .
This ice rink has ice hockey and public skating .
On weekends , there are very limited public skating hours , so calling in advance to check on open skating times is recommended .
Open skating ¥ 1200 admission , ¥ 500 skate rental .
Tamako Jitenshado
( 多摩湖自転車道 ) ( The southern terminus is on the main thoroughfare Itsukaichikaido and just across the street from Gusto in northern
Musashino
.
) .
This twelve kilometer bike and pedestrian path begins along the southern edge of Nishitokyo , runs fairly straight NW , and terminates far to the NW at two reservoirs .
It makes for a nice walk or leisurely bike ride of any desirable length .
Buy
The best shopping in Nishitokyo is found around the north side of Tanashi Station , where there are several department stores and many other shops .
Jupiter Coffee
( ジュピターコーヒー ) , Tanashicho
2-1-1
( In the basement of the Seibu department store just north of Tanashi Station . ) , ☏ +81 42-460-2661 .
This shop has best selection of foreign food in Nishitokyo .
Eat
Restaurants are found in concentration near Tanashi Station .
Abiskar
( アビスカ ) , Prince Plaza 109 , Minamimachi
4-4-2
( Several hundred meters east of Tanashi Station 's south exit , on the right . ) , ☏ +81 4-2469-7880 .
11AM-3PM , 5PM-11:30PM .
A small Nepalese-Indian restaurant , great for budget travelers .
¥ 700 sets .
Dropkick
( ドロップキック ) , Tanashicho
3-11-9
, ☏ +81 42-467-6337 .
This restaurant specializes in okonomiyaki and has a well-stocked bar .
¥ 600 - 1200 per plate .
Mae Sre Ruan
( メースィールアン ) , Minamimachi
5-5-1
( 50m south of the south entrance to Tanashi Station . ) , ☏ +81 424-67-3280 .
This Thai restaurant serves tasty Thai fare .
¥ 700 - 1400 per plate .
RAJ
( らじ ) , Minamicho
4-1-15
( 70m south of the south entrance to Tanashi Station .
Next to Seven-Eleven ) , ☏ +81 42-463-5530 .
Daily 11AM-3PM , 5PM-11PM .
An Indian restaurant that makes for a good late evening stop .
¥ 500 - 1000 .
TEXAS
( テキサス ) , Tanashi-cho
3-3-8
( From the north exit of Tanashi Station , go two traffic lights north .
The restaurant is on the right about 30 meters before the second light . ) , ☏ +81 42-466-2898 .
M - F 11:30AM-3:30PM , 5:30-midnight ; Sa - Su 11:30AM-midnight .
This is a western-style steak house serving hamburgers , steaks , and a number of desserts .
¥ 1000 - 3000 .
Ichikawa
( いち川 ) , Minamicho
4-4-2
( From the south exit of Tanashi Station , go east parallel to the tracks for around 200m .
The restaurant is in a covered row of shops just south of the street . ) , ☏ +81 42-468-7559 .
M - F 11:30AM-1:30PM , 5PM-9PM ; Sa 11:30AM-1:30PM , 4:30PM-9PM .
A small and tasty and clean tempura restaurant .
¥ 700 - 1500 .
Yamatoken
( 大和軒 ) , Mukodaicho
1-20-11
( 20 minutes walk SWS from Tanashi Station .
Located opposite Mukodai Park . ) , ☏ +81 42-461-3323 .
A mom-and-pop Japanese diner .
Serving size is large .
¥ 700 - 900 .
Drink
Karaoke Mokomoko
( カラオケモコモコ ) , Tanashicho
3-9-14
( 2 blocks NE of Tanashi Station . ) , ☏ +81 42-463-5733 .
This is a clean karaoke parlor with an extensive drink list .
The song selection is quite extensive .
SHOUN
, Sky Building 5F , Tanashicho
2-2-3
( From the north exit of Tanashi Station , walk north to McDonald 's .
The Sky Building is NE diagonally across the street .
Take the elevator to the fifth floor . ) , ☏ +81 42-446-7000 .
M , W , Th , Su 6PM-3AM ; F - Sa 6PM-5AM .
A bar with standard drinks , lots of whiskey , and tasty appetizers .
Drinks ¥ 300 - 800 .
Half Yard
( ハーフヤード ) , Tanashi Daini Marble Building B1 , Tanashi-cho
4-28-14
( From the north exit of Tanashi Station , go NW 100m .
Look for a sign and stairwell on the west side of the street . ) , ☏ +81 50-5789-1742 . 5PM-2AM .
This beer hall has many international beers in the bottle and a few on tap .
The food is well-prepared pub fare .
The place is clean , and there are several big-screen TVs showing sports . cover ¥ 100 , drinks ¥ 600 - 1,200 .
Sleep
If you have no specific reason to stay in this area ,
Shinjuku
is thirty minutes by train , centrally located , and has a large selection hotels .
Shirakawa Ryokan
( 白河旅館 ) , Tanashicho
4-6-8
( From the north exit of Tanashi Station , go west along the train tracks for 300m . ) , ☏ +81 42-461-4438 .
This is a small and clean ryokan .
The staff are friendly and helpful , but they only speak Japanese .
Reservations by telephone , also only in Japanese .
Room and breakfast ¥ 6000 per person .
Connect
Nishitokyo City Hall
( 西東京市役所 ) ,
5-6-13
Minamicho ( 300m SW of Tanashi Station . ) , ☏ +81 42-464-1311 .
City Hall has essential for long-term residents of the city .
Important information is available in Japanese and ( on paper ) in English .
Go next
To the south is
Musashino
, home of the popular shopping area
Kichijoji
.
